info.title: BC Route Planner REST API
info.description:
Finds shortest/fastest route between a start point and one or more stop points on British Columbia's public road network. Here are some geocoded addresses to play with:
18 Douglas St,Victoria -123.36962,48.40892
1002 Johnson St, Victoria -123.355745,48.426206
543 Johnson St, Victoria, BC -123.36907,48.42770
14 Centennial Sq, Victoria, BC -123.36564,48.42863
1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster -122.92009,49.20063
808 Jackson Cres, New Westminster -122.90762,49.22558
10810 McDonald Rd, Chilliwack -121.93808,49.19859
3950 June Springs Rd, Kelowna -119.40751,49.83960
1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.85402,49.74448
1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.832759,49.730500 (parcelPoint)
2499 Walbran Pl, Courtenay -124.97295,49.71518
2013 Smoke Bluff Rd, Squamish -123.13946,49.70401
235 Kelvin Grove Way, Lions Bay -123.23524,49.45035.
Please see our data collection notice

get.summary: Get distance and travel time between two geographic points
get.description: Represents the distance and time of the shortest or fastest path between given start and end points.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Format of representation

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. See points

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

parameters.name: routeDescription
parameters.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

200.description: Distance and time of the shortest or fastest route

get.summary: Get distance and travel time between each pair of geographic points
get.description: Represents the distance and time of the shortest or fastest paths between all pairs of fromPoints and toPoints. The number of fromPoints times the number of toPoints should not exceed 100 or the request will time out.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Format of representation

parameters.name: fromPoints
parameters.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A comma-separated list of origin points. See fromPoints

parameters.name: toPoints
parameters.description: Example: -124.972951,49.715181,-123.139464,49.704015. A comma-separated list of destination points. See toPoints

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

parameters.name: routeDescription
parameters.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

200.description: A list of routes and their route distances/times.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Format of representation

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. See points

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

parameters.name: routeDescription
parameters.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

200.description: Geometry, distance, and time of the shortest or fastest route

get.summary: Get the directions, path, distance and travel time between a series of geographic points
get.description: Represents the turn-by-turn directions, geometry, distance, and time of the shortest path or fastest path between given start and end points

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Format of representation

parameters.name: points

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

parameters.name: routeDescription
